name: OTHER_PROV
description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The OTHER_PROV table holds other provider values set by the system during claims processing or by user edits. These values are only filled for paper UB claims.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PPR_OTH_NAM_LAST
columns.description: This item holds the other provider's last name.

columns.name: PPR_OTH_NAM_FIRST
columns.description: This item holds the other provider's first name.

columns.name: PPR_OTH_NAM_MID
columns.description: This item holds the other provider's middle name.

columns.name: PPR_OTH_NAM_SUF
columns.description: This item holds the suffix to the other provider's name (Jr, III, etc).

columns.name: PPR_OTH_NPI
columns.description: This item holds the other provider's National Provider ID (NPI).

columns.name: PPR_OTH_SEC_QUAL
columns.description: This item holds a qualifier describing additional ID used to identify the other provider.

columns.name: PPR_OTH_SEC_ID
columns.description: This item holds an additional ID for the other provider.

columns.name: PPR_OTH_TYP_QUAL
columns.description: This item holds the other provider's provider type qualifier.
